Improvement of the management of human risk in agricultural organizations
Improvement of the management of human risk in agricultural organizations

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Demidchik, G.I., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Effective work with the staff depends on the ability to manage risks. This is connected with two factors of people management: first, the process of risk and staff management can be organized in different ways, and secondly, managers and specialists on duty to manage the risk possess different knowledge, skills and experience. The most important task of economic managers appears reducing of human risk to a minimum. According to this, in the system of human resource management should be offered a new approach to the classification of personnel risks. Accordingly, this paper proposed a new approach to the classification of personnel risks, allowing detailed look of peculiarities of the poultry industry and the specifics of the problem. A work is being done to improve the organizational structure of agro-industrial complex. This will create a governance structure that optimally combines administrative and economic methods to specify the administrative functions of national and regional authorities and management, to intensify innovations, to integrate domestic agricultural sector in the global agricultural market on the basis of a coherent policy of farmers and processors, and, as a result, significantly improve the economic performance of agro-industrial complex.
